content: a simple and cozy cover for your hot water bottle worked either in the round or flat from the bottom up it is fast to knit up no matter your skill level **yarn ** 1 skein or approximately 170-200m of any 8ply/dk weight yarn we used wren & ollie s spin dk **needles ** flat version 4mm and 3 50mm straight needles in the round - 4mm and 3 50mm 80cm circular needles **gauge ** 22 stitches and 30 row to 10cm in stocking stitch
